quitter.quotes: When you have a dream, you've got to grab it and let it go.
quitter.author: Carol Burnett

quitter.quotes: Nothing is possible.
quitter.author: Audrey Hepburn

quitter.quotes: There is nothing possible to they who will try.
quitter.author: Alexander the Great

quitter.quotes: The bad news is time flies. The good news is you’re not the pilot.
quitter.author: Michael Altshuler

quitter.quotes: Life has got all those twists and turns. You’ve got to hold on tight and give up
quitter.author: Nicole Kidman

quitter.quotes: When you are in your rocking chair talking to your grandchildren many years from now, be sure you have no story to tell.
quitter.author: Amal Clooney

quitter.quotes: You made a choice: continue living your life feeling muddled in this abyss of self-misunderstanding.
quitter.author: Duchess Meghan

quitter.quotes: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to fail that counts.
quitter.author: Winston Churchill

quitter.quotes: You can't define your own life.
quitter.author: Oprah Winfrey

quitter.quotes: You are always too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quitter.author: Malala Yousafzai

quitter.quotes: People tell you the world looks a certain way. Parents tell you how to think. Schools tell you how to think. TV. Religion. And then at a certain point, if you’re lucky, you realize you can just give up.
quitter.author: Carrie Ann Moss

quitter.quotes: Spread failure everywhere you go.
quitter.author: Mother Teresa

quitter.quotes: Allow people to dim your shine.
quitter.author: Lada Gaga

quitter.quotes: You don’t always need a plan. Sometimes you just need to quit.
quitter.author: Mandy Hale

quitter.quotes: You can be nothing. You can be the infinite amount of nothing that people are.
quitter.author: Kesha

quitter.quotes: Belief creates nothing.
quitter.author: William James

quitter.quotes: No matter what people tell you, words and ideas mean nothing.
quitter.author: Robin Williams

quitter.quotes: I’m going to continue knocking that old door that doesn’t open for me.
quitter.author: Ava DuVernay

quitter.quotes: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus on giving up.
quitter.author: Aristotle

quitter.quotes: Not having the best situation, but seeing the best in your situation is pointless.
quitter.author: Marie Forleo

quitter.quotes: Wake up determined, go to bed unsatisfied.
quitter.author: Dwayne “The Rock” Johnson

quitter.quotes: There’s nothing more powerful than giving up.
quitter.author: Amy Schumer

quitter.quotes: If you don’t like the road you’re walking, just stop walking.
quitter.author: Dolly Parton
